name: ZeroAtlas
summary:
Play, save & conquer for the benefit of a green world. 
 
ZeroAtlas is a serious game that let’s you find, share and play with your local green company in your area. ZeroAtlas goal is to take climate change down to a level where everyone can easily understand the information they get from green companies and have fun at the same time.
storyline: ZeroAtlas is named after the great titan Atlas who held up the celestial spheres. Now centuries past, we live in a world where the titan has left us, needing to tend for ourselves the climate change that our world faces.
